description: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Public Health. Eligibility Requirements Major in Public Health Full-time undergraduate student Minimum 3.0 GPA Second semester junior or first semester senior classification Demonstrates financial need Recipient must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship Award Requirements The recipient of this scholarship must write a letter of thanks to the Public Health Program Faculty and turn it into the College of Education & Professional Studies deanÂ’s office, attention CEPS Development Office.
